attributes.action: To remove 19th century and Shakesphere from AQA Gcse literature papers
attributes.background: 19 th century and Shakesphere literature doesn't help at all in future life such as in Macbeth words e.g. "gall" and "unsex me here" it is not needed in the future

rejection.details:
The content of exams is the responsibility of the exam board, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like the Government to change the national curriculum, you could start a new petition about that. You can find out more about the curriculum here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-english-language-and-gcse-english-literature-new-content
